title: How to Draw Mario and Luigi

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw two slightly slanted vertical lines below the circle.
steps.content: Draw two slightly slanted vertical lines below the circle. These will serve as Luigi's neck.

steps.title: For Luigi's body, connect a larger and slightly stretched circle below the neck.
steps.content: For Luigi's body, connect a larger and slightly stretched circle below the neck.

steps.title: Draw a pair of stretched ovals as Luigi's arms.
steps.content: Draw a pair of stretched ovals as Luigi's arms. Connect them to where the shoulders should be. Add a circle on the tip of these arms for the hands.

steps.title: Below the big circle, add another pair of stretched ovals for Luigi's legs and feet.
steps.content: Below the big circle, add another pair of stretched ovals for Luigi's legs and feet.

steps.title: Draw a U-shape below the circle that represents Luigi's head.
steps.content: Draw a U-shape below the circle that represents Luigi's head. This will be his chin.

steps.title: With this chin part completing the whole head outline, draw three slightly curved horizontal lines across the entire head.
steps.content: With this chin part completing the whole head outline, draw three slightly curved horizontal lines across the entire head.

steps.title: Using these three lines as guide lines, draw Luigi's facial details (eyes, large nose, mustache, etc.
steps.content: Using these three lines as guide lines, draw Luigi's facial details (eyes, large nose, mustache, etc. )

steps.title: Trace the outline of Luigi's body.
steps.content: Trace the outline of Luigi's body.

steps.title: Add details such as his hat, gloves, and clothing.
steps.content: Add details such as his hat, gloves, and clothing.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw a slightly vertically-stretched copy of this circle.
steps.content: Draw a slightly vertically-stretched copy of this circle. Place this stretched circle within the first circle, with its bottom protruding out the first circle. This combination of circles would be Mario's head.

steps.title: Draw a copy of the first circle below the stretched circle.
steps.content: Draw a copy of the first circle below the stretched circle. This will serve as Mario's body.

steps.title: Draw a pair of small circles where Mario's shoulders should be.
steps.content: Draw a pair of small circles where Mario's shoulders should be. Connect stretched ovals for both circles to serve as his arms. At the end of each of these ovals, add another small circle for Mario's hands.

steps.title: Draw a pair of stretched circles to serve as Mario's legs and feet.
steps.content: Draw a pair of stretched circles to serve as Mario's legs and feet.

steps.title: Across Mario's head part, draw a center vertical line.
steps.content: Across Mario's head part, draw a center vertical line. Draw also a horizontal line across it, intersecting the vertical line at the center. Add a parallel horizontal line just above the first one.

steps.title: Using these lines as guides, draw Mario's circular nose at the center.
steps.content: Using these lines as guides, draw Mario's circular nose at the center. Add his eyes, mustache, mouth and eyebrows.

steps.title: Complete his facial outline.
steps.content: Complete his facial outline. Add his ears and plumber's hat.

steps.title: Trace the outline of Mario's body and clothing.
steps.content: Trace the outline of Mario's body and clothing.

steps.title: Add more detail lines on his hands, ears, eyes and clothing.
steps.content: Add more detail lines on his hands, ears, eyes and clothing.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines. Don't forget to place the signature letter "M" on his hat.

steps.title: Thicken the drawing lines.
steps.content: Thicken the drawing lines. Color the drawing as desired.
